message: Starting review of state_db.py and state_db_enhanced.py to verify enhanced version has all functionality
Verified state_db_enhanced.py has all original functionality plus new tables and methods. Creating backup of original state_db.py
Successfully replaced state_db.py with enhanced version. Verifying imports in real_mcp_server.py and health_daemon.py
Testing enhanced state_db functionality with new lifecycle management functions
Added backward compatibility functions. Now performing final verification of the integration

Successfully completed state_db.py replacement with enhanced version. The enhanced state_db.py now includes all original functionality plus new tables (reviews, agent_findings, handovers), enhanced agent columns (model, PIDs, tracked_files), lifecycle management functions, and dashboard integration. All imports verified working in real_mcp_server.py and health_daemon.py. Original backed up as state_db_backup.py
